== Peramangalam (CT) (627832) ==

Peramangalam (CT) is a town in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 8.76 sq. km. and harbouring 3334 households with total population of 13260 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 6 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 309 km. Male population is 6457 and female population is 6803. Scheduled Caste population is 1065 and Scheduled Tribes population is 10. Census Location Code of the town is 627832<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 6 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 89 km. Railway station is at Thrissur at a distance of 6 km.
